reviews.text: Average small station for your basic needs. Has a ticket machine, and actually some new departure boards which are pretty nice. A couple inter-city trains stop here daily but I recommend this for just getting local trains down to Taunton or Exeter and up to Bristol. If you wish to go further like London, Plymouth, Swindon etc I recommend going to Weston-super-Mare.

Pretty straightforward station if you know it... however it is unmanned the majority of the time with one ticket machine which is temperamental. It has a speaker system to find out train updates which is useless if you are deaf.
A modern railway station on the Great Western Main Line. HSTs pass through daily and steam trains pass through weekly in the Summer.
Just a middle of the road unmanned train station.
